name: The Journey of the HMS Theseus
name_original: The Journey of the HMS Theseus
description:
Oh No

You promised your darling betrothed that you'd come home in one piece. You are homeward bound (that's good), but your ship - the HMS Theseus - keeps breaking down (that's bad)!

Keep your ship in one piece long enough to make it ashore. Good luck, sailor!

---

How to Play What to do

Keep your ship homeward bound by directing your crew members to fix the various issues that come up. For instance, a hole may appear in the ship... or the sail may tear... or the mast may break!

Be careful of the rising water in the ship. If the ship sinks, you'll all have to swim ashore! Send a crewman to the Pump-o-Matic water pump at the bow (the front) of the ship to help clear it up.

Controls

Click and drag crewmen to the issue you'd like to fix.
